bubbles.caravaneer-1: Can't wait until the next stop !
bubbles.caravaneer-4: Gotta make sure these wares are safe.
bubbles.caravaneer-5: Caravaneer is a risky job, but it pays.
bubbles.guard-1: Move along, nothing to see here.
bubbles.guard-2: I've got my eye on you.
bubbles.guard-4: It's a peaceful town, here. It'll stay that way.
bubbles.steal-warning-2: Don't test me. Give it back.
bubbles.steal-warning-3: Last warning ! Put that back, or else !
bubbles.steal-warning-4: Guards ! We got a shoplifter over here

slotMachine.intro: The slot machine stands before you. How much do you want to bet ?
slotMachine.lost: You lost. Better luck next time !

ash-aven.description: Amidst the polluted ruins of the once beautiful capital of the Crystal Empire, an unlikely village took shape. A haven for those that no one else would accept among them: the ghouls. Its inhabitants decided to name it Ash-Aven.
ash-aven.name: Ash-Aven

bibins-band.description: A gang located in the Cristal Den's slums, led by the mysterious and providencial Bibin.
bibins-band.name: Bibin's Band

cristal-den.description: The most prosperous town of the crystal wastes, Crystal Den was built by the Potiok family, soon after the destruction of the Crystal Empire. The Crystal Den is home to many farmers, merchants, caravaneers, slavers, and it is also the place of respite for many lost souls, who live day by day and try to get by.
cristal-den.name: Crystal Den

diamond-dogs.description: The diamond dogs living under the ground of Junkville and its scrapyard.
diamond-dogs.name: Diamond dogs

golden-herd.description: The Golden Herd is a bunch of nomadic tribe herding together to find strength in numbers. Warriors, proud of their strength, they sustain themselves by exploiting the weak, demanding tribute from the towns they pass by, ransacking and pillaging whoever refuses to submit to their might.
golden-herd.name: Golden Herd

hillburrow.description: A small and peaceful village built on top of a hill, in the calmest parts of the Crystal Wasteland. While the townfolk enjoy a mostly uneventful life of pasture, the old coal mine may attract the appetites of more ambitious ponies.
hillburrow.name: Hillburrow

junkville.description: A small community living off the plentiful resources of a junkyard.
junkville.name: Junkville

potioks.description: The Potioks are the ruler of Cristal Den, and their influence extends further into the cristal wastes. They're a tight family, or so it seems to the outsiders.
potioks.name: Potiok Family

stable-103.description: The inhabitants of Stable 103, your home, your haven, your family.
stable-103.name: Stable 103

steel-rangers.description: The Steel Rangers are an elite faction of militant, technologically-advanced earth and unicorn ponies clad in steel armor. The last remaining members of the Ministry of Wartime Technology, they were born when it and the Ministry of Arcane Sciences cooperated to create the steel power armor that personifies the Steel Rangers.
steel-rangers.name: Steel Rangers

thornhoof.description: Thornhoof is a small walled city, which recently fell prey to the raids of the Golden Herd. The city is ruled by a republic, designed to reward the most deserving, and to delegate the power to an elite of scientists, engineers and warriors.
thornhoof.name: Thornhoof

thornhoof-refugees.description: The town of Basalburg was attacked, pillaged and destroyed by the Golden Herd. The few survivors who managed to escape found refuge in the town of Thornhoof.  They've managed to survive there since then, waiting for better days.
thornhoof-refugees.name: Basalburg Refugees

unhaus.description: Built tightly upon a hill, Unhaus is a small haven located on a trade route. It serves as waustation for caravans, and requires a toll from them.
unhaus.name: Unhaus

medicine-skill.in-combat: You can't use medicine during combat
medicine-skill.max-use-reached: {{target}}'s wounds have already received treatment and can't be healed anymore right now.
medicine-skill.used-on: {{user}} used medicine on {{target}} and healed it for {{hp}} hit points.

catch-robber.description: The hostel's director asked you to bring him the thief that steals from customers at night.

director-scene.part1: Ah, such a pleasure making your aquaintance ! At long last we'll put an end to that situation.
director-scene.part10: Oh, no, we can't have that here. Bobo ?
director-scene.part12: Last chance. I really don't like seeing you in that sorry state. Please give me one good reason not to kill you.
director-scene.part14: What a pity. Very well. Bobo, please rid me of that pest.
director-scene.part2: My personal told me you've stolen quite a sum to our establishment. I'll go straight to the point.
director-scene.part3: What have you done with your gains ? And how do you plan on making up to me ?
director-scene.part4: [spits] I have nothing to tell you. Do what you have to do.
director-scene.part5: Very well. Bobo, it's your time to act.
director-scene.part8: So, how do you do ? Are you gonna talk ?

catch-robber.title: Catch a thief

fetchGemstones.description: You've crossed path with a diamond dog. He asked you to help him gather gemstones, and you accepted. He also lent you the tools you'll need to do the deed. Let's pick up that pickaxe and start mining !
fetchGemstones.objective-give: Bring gemstones to your new diamond dog buddy.
fetchGemstones.objective-mine: Use a pickaxe to mine gemstones in the cavern.
fetchGemstones.title: Gemstones to diamond dog

sampleTownButter.description: The baker needs butter to bake cakes. It seems like the hostel's kitchen hoards a lot of the available ingredients around town.
sampleTownButter.give-butter: You gave butter to the baker.
sampleTownButter.title: Help the baker bake

tutorial.description:
You find yourself lost and trapped in the depth of a dark cavern. Resisting the pain of a considerable headache, you have no recollection of how you've gotten here.

The cold and damp air displeases you greatly... how about looking for an exit, and get back to the gracious sky of Equestria ?
tutorial.description-completed: You defeated Trial Blister, one way or another, and access to the outside world was granted to you.
tutorial.description-with-trial: In you search for an exit, you've met Trial Blister. It seems like you were dumped in this cavern as a trial to check your abilities to survive in the desolated land of Equestria. Trial Blister is the last challenge you must overcome to reach the outside world.
tutorial.exit-cavern-success: For completing tutorial, you gained {{xp}} experience points.
tutorial.last-trial-success: For surviving all the trials of the tutorial, you gained {{xp}} experience points.
tutorial.leave-first-room: Find a way to go through the first door.
tutorial.leave-first-room-success: For successfully exiting the first room, you've gained {{xp}} experience points.
tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.win-first-fight-success: For winning your first fight, you've gained {{xp}} experience points.

sample-city.director-at-lunch: Boss is taking her launch. Come back in a couple hours.
sample-city.director-not-receiving: Boss isn't receiving anyone right now. Come back later.

spells.empty-spellbook: You haven't learned any spells yet.
spells.title: Spells

stable-entrance.about-to-exit: Ahead of you, you can see real daylight for the first time of your life. As your eyes dart towards the ceiling, you notice it is endless and grows beyond everything you can see. So that's what the sky looks like... as your notion of spaces get challenged by this new experience, you start feeling a bit nauseous. This is gonna take some getting used to.

bubbles.passerby-3: Hey {{name}} ! Sorry, I'm busy right now, see you later !

places.random-desert-cabin: a shack in the middle of the desert
